net.codemusic.smartears.event
Interface ISettingsEventManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventManager
public interface ISettingsEventManager

This interface represents a class that is responsble for registering, unregistering, and propogating SettingsEvents to SettingsListeners

Method Summary
 void addSettingsListener(SettingsListener listener)
          Registers a SettingsListener
 void processDelayChanged(SettingsEvent e)
          Notifies all registered SettingsListeners of this event by calling their delayChanged(SettingsEvent e) method
 void processDurationChanged(SettingsEvent e)
          Notifies all registered SettingsListeners of this event by calling their durationChanged(SettingsEvent e) method
 void processInstrumentChanged(SettingsEvent e)
          Notifies all registered SettingsListeners of this event by calling their instrumentChanged(SettingsEvent e) method
 void processPlayModeChanged(SettingsEvent e)
          Notifies all registered SettingsListeners of this event by calling their playModeChanged(SettingsEvent e) method
 void removeSettingsListener(SettingsListener listener)
          Unregisters a SettingsListener
 

Method Detail

addSettingsListener

public void addSettingsListener(SettingsListener listener)
Registers a SettingsListener

Parameters:
listener - the SettingsListener to register. It will now be notified of all SettingsEvents

removeSettingsListener

public void removeSettingsListener(SettingsListener listener)
Unregisters a SettingsListener

Parameters:
listener - the SettingsListener to unregister. It willno longer be notified of any SettingsEvents

processDelayChanged

public void processDelayChanged(SettingsEvent e)
Notifies all registered SettingsListeners of this event by calling their delayChanged(SettingsEvent e) method

Parameters:
e - the SettingsEvent associated with this change

processDurationChanged

public void processDurationChanged(SettingsEvent e)
Notifies all registered SettingsListeners of this event by calling their durationChanged(SettingsEvent e) method

Parameters:
e - the SettingsEvent associated with this change

processInstrumentChanged

public void processInstrumentChanged(SettingsEvent e)
Notifies all registered SettingsListeners of this event by calling their instrumentChanged(SettingsEvent e) method

Parameters:
e - the SettingsEvent associated with this change

processPlayModeChanged

public void processPlayModeChanged(SettingsEvent e)
Notifies all registered SettingsListeners of this event by calling their playModeChanged(SettingsEvent e) method

Parameters:
e - the SettingsEvent associated with this change
